This resource is a work in progress and has been created 



have been created to use publicly available data on the internet in order to explore specific questions on the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on teaching practices.

<br>

## Broad research question(s)
*"..what educators have learned from teaching during the pandemic, how their practices have been disrupted, what kind of innovations have resulted from this and how these are evolving."*

<br>

## Broad methodology

This resource draws on a number of R programming packages and approaches. The broad approach incldues the following stages:

1. Collect public data 
2. Clean and prepare the text data
3. Carry out analysis
